page.title: 19SURVEY:MEDIA IN HORSHAM
page.content: 63 people were surveyed. 84% chose the West Sussex County Times as the most popular newspaper followed by the Horsham Advertiser, Evening Argus and the Gazette. 76% thought that their paper was truthful, 97% thought it was good value for money. The news pages were the most popular, but only 6% read the situations vacant. 54% of the respondents listen to local radio, Radio Mercury being the most popular. How ever listening time was only half hr or less per day with the morning being the most popular time. Other stations listened to were County Sound and Radio Sussex. The most popular regional T.V news program was Coast to Coast and 80% considered that local news coverage on T.V was good. The main cause for complaint was that the programs were boring or biased.
